ValidationRule.description: Restricts the record type of child
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.Name <> 'Expert Request' && RecordType.Name <> 'Japan Engagement Request' && RecordType.Name <> 'Incident' && NOT(ISNULL(ParentId)) && (Parent.RecordType.Name='Service Incident' || Parent.RecordType.Name='Incident' || Parent.RecordType.Name='Service Request')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Child case record type can either be Engagement Request or Incident.
